DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Pravastatin Sodium Tablets 80 mg Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: Single Dose Two-Way Crossover Fasting Bioequivalence Study Pravastatin 80 mg Tablets Dr.Reddy 's Laboratories Limited Pravachol 80mg , Bristol Myers Squibb Healthy Volunteers . A total 43 non-smoking subject ( 31 men 12 woman ) include study , 43 finish study accord protocol.The study perform single-dose two-way ( 80 mg ) , crossover bioequivalence study adequate washout period ( 7 day ) two period study equal number subject randomly assign receive study test
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female least 18 year age . Informed nature study give write informed consent . Have body weight within 15 % appropriate range define 1983 Metropolitan Life Company table weigh least 100 lb . ( Appendix I ) . Hypersensitivity Pravastatin ( pravacholÂ® ) , similar compound . Any history ofa clinical condition might affect drug absorption , metabolism excretion . Recent history ( within 1 year ) mental illness , drug addiction , drug abuse alcoholism . Donation great 500 ml blood past 4 week prior study dose difficulty donate blood Received investigational drug within 4 week prior study dose . Currently take prescription medication , except oral contraceptive , within 7 day prior study dose overthecounter medication within 3 day study dose . This prohibition include vitamin herbal preparation take nutritional supplement nontherapeutic indication judge attend physician . Tobacco use ( > 5 cigarette per day ) 3 month prior study dose . If female , subject lactate positive pregnancy test screen prior two treatment period . Females child bear potential must use medically acceptable method contraception throughout entire study period one week study complete . Medically acceptable method contraception may use subject partner : oral contraceptive , progestin injection implant , condom spermicide , diaphragm spermicide , IDD , vaginal spermicidal suppository , surgical sterilization partner ( ) abstinence . Females take oral contraceptive must take consistently least three month prior receive study medication .
